channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus International -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus International -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-17085|2024-08-05T01:33:16.729Z -- micro%20focus%20international -- operations%20agent
item.description: XXE attack vulnerability on Micro Focus Operations Agent, affected version 12.0, 12.01, 12.02, 12.03, 12.04, 12.05, 12.06, 12.10, 12.11. The vulnerability could be exploited to do an XXE attack on Operations Agent.

item.title: CVE-2019-17087|2024-08-05T01:33:16.562Z -- micro%20focus%20international -- acutoweb
item.description: Unauthorized file download vulnerability in all supported versions of Micro Focus AcuToWeb. The vulnerability could be exploited to enumerate and download files from the filesystem of the system running AcuToWeb, with the privileges of the account AcuToWeb is running under.
